droid.name: Chris Ré
droid.verification: Chris Ré is verified as a co-founder of Together AI. He is a prominent computer scientist and professor at Stanford University, known for his work in machine learning and data-centric AI. He co-founded Together AI alongside Vipul Ved Prakash, Ce Zhang, and Percy Liang. His background includes being a MacArthur Fellow and previously co-founding Lattice.io (acquired by Apple) and Snorkel AI.
